message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you take $30.  Think about the inflation - it's hitting you harder than me!
Your offer was unfair. I'm proposing a more balanced split. Let's settle this quickly and avoid further losses from inflation.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere fast. I'm feeling the inflation pinch, so I need to up my share. Let's split it $60/$40 and call it a day.
